page.title: 10FARMING IN THE DISTRICT.
page.content: There are{6 owner occupied farms}on our patch,ranging in size from 330 to 26 acres,the average field size being 11 acres. The owners run their farms with contract help at peak workload times.In general they are{livestock} farms with a little arable.It is interesting that 2 of the farms were dairy until 1981.The rearing of{cattle on grass is predominant,with the animals wintering indoors on home grown silage for 5 months.The smallest farm fattens between 40 and 100{sheep a year. Some arable crops are grown,129 acres of{barley}and 150 acres of {wheat}.A little fruit and vegetable growing takes place.Tractors are owned by all the farms but only 1 has a combined harvester. The Uckfield by-pass has affected Copwood Farm as you will read.
